synopsis.text:
Pat, Pot, and Pit, affectionately known as PiPoPa, are three peculiar beings that Yuta Akikawa stumbles upon in the vast digital realm of the Net World. This technophobic young boy finds himself thrust into this virtual universe after receiving a cryptic message on his cell phone, the only piece of modern technology he finds tolerable.

Following his mother's new job at the technologically advanced city of Kamimai, Yuta's life takes an unexpected turn as he finds himself traversing the very technology he once feared. Alongside PiPoPa, Yuta embarks on thrilling escapades that span both the human and digital worlds, forging new friendships and facing challenges that threaten the delicate balance between the two realms.

In this captivating tale of courage and camaraderie, Yuta and his newfound allies must protect the Net World from sinister forces seeking to exploit it for global domination. Join Yuta and PiPoPa as they navigate the intricate web of technology and friendship in this enchanting anime adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
